import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../Components/Rating' //params import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const ProductScreen = ( ) => { const { id } = useParams() const product = products.find( product => product._id === id ) return (
Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: {product.price} In Stock: {`${product.countInStock}` > 0 ? `${product.countInStock} Items` : 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
